main event: An unidentified flying object was reported sighted over Cleveland, Ohio, on 22 June 1954, with witnesses observing it for approximately 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as silvered, disc-shaped or elliptical, pointed at both ends and hovered before moving out rapidly., The object appeared to be the size of two C-47 houses combined and was gray in color., Witnesses reported no sound during the sighting., The sighting duration was approximately 10-15 minutes, and the object disappeared rapidly., The sighting was investigated by the Cleveland Field Office of the Air Force.
witness description: a Cleveland citizen who reported the sighting to the Field Office
